00010 
00011        Win32 implimentation of gettimeofday(). If not running Windows, the unix version 
00012        of gettimeofday is used.
00013 
00014        \param ptv Time val structure to store the current time into.
00015        \param notused This parameter is not used, and is present to maintain compatibility with unix gettimeofday().
00016 
00017        \return Zero is always returned. Zero on unix means success, -1 for error.
00018 *********************************************************************/
00019

00021 #ifndef GETTIMEOFDAY_H
00022 #define GETTIMEOFDAY_H
00023 
00024 int gettimeofday(struct timeval* ptv,int);
00025
